div.p: Ỽeithiau bho dhigỽydh dỽy edryd gỽrthebaỽg ag ỿn gỿbhrodedh.

div.head: Eghraph.
div.p:
Ỿ dyn cỿbydh ſydh bob amſer ỿn dlaỽd: ỿ dyn aghhỿbydh ſy bob amſer ỿn oludaỽg: ỿ dyn cỿbydh ſy elyn idho eihun: ỿ
dyn aghhỿbydh ſy gỿnorthỽyỽr i erailh: ỿ dyn cỿbỿdhaỽg ſy‘n lhaỽn gobhalon: ỿ dyn aghhỿbydh ſy‘n lhaỽn o dhidhanỽch a lhaỽenydh.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿ dhiaeth.
div.l: Vs man yỽ ‘r cedyrn ſy myỽn codiad;
Ac aur ỽyt tithau teg ỽrteithiad;
A lherr yn ỽrthych ỽr lhỽyr nerthiad;
A gỽenithin ỽyd gan ỽaith nodiad;
Am bỿnn bhỿ rhoſſyn cei bhaỽrhad Cỿmru
Ac iaỽn oedh dỿnnu Gỽynedh danad.
div.p: I. M. i Io. Sal. o Leỽ. eſc.
Rhaid yỽ gochelyd ỽrth ỿmarbher a‘rdhulh honn rhac cỿmryd na‘r gair gỽaelabh na‘r gỽannabh ỿn ỿ bannodau.

div.head: IIII.
div.p: Rhith aralh ar Edryd ſydh gỿnbebic; pen dhechreuo lhaỽer o eiriau ar ỿr lhỿthỿren ol ỿnol.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Dỽg, duth, didaỽl, druth dadldri, deỽr, Dydur,
Dyn daer, doeth, dandỿ dỽr di,
Dalu debỽ driſt, del dail droſti,

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Mỿnych ỿmarbher a‘r dhulh honn ſy anhỿ draeth. Canys gormod aỽydh idhi ſy argoel ỿnbhỿdrỽydh: a‘r ſain ſy annyodl, a thrỽſcl; mal ỿ clỿỽch ỿn ỿr eghraph vchod.

div.head: XXIIII. PENNOD.
Am Dharỿmchoel.
div.p:
DArỿmchoel yỽ, pann adrodhir ỿ cỿphely;b ſain neu air
ỿgh ghhloedigaethau, neu dhyỽedhion ỿ braỽdhegau. Deubhath dharỿmchỽel ỿ ſydh.

div.head: I.
div.p: Ỿ rhyỽ gỿntabh, pan adrodhir ỿn niỽedh bannodau ỿ cỿpl elyb ſain.

div.head: Eghraph.
div.l: Ỿr adar a hedant, ar pyſc a nobhiant,
A‘r Prỿbhed a‘mluſcent, a‘r gỽenyn a bhelant,
Pob peth a ỿmdhaith i gỿnnulb ei borthiant;
Ond ỿ gler a godhant, a‘r lhadron a‘i dibhỽynant.
div.p: Talieſſin.
Gỽelỽch bhod ỿ cỿphelyb ſain ỿn ỿ bannodau, ſebh gỽahannodol, a chỿbhannodaỽl, lhe maer‘r ſain ỿn dỿỽedhu ỿn -ant
Aralh.
Einon Len.
Aralh.
div.l: Trabho cỿỽir cerdh, trabho curo cad,
Tra bho rhỽydh ỿn rhoi, tra bho rhodh ỿn rhad,
Tra bho hael ỿn hael, tra bho hil na had,
Tra bho tỿrbha ‘n glir, tra bho trebh na gỽlad;
Ti gei glod bennod heb ỽad na therbhyn,
Tra bhager oes dyn, tra bho gỽr o ſtad.
div.p: Io. M. i lo Sal. o Leỽ. eſc.
Aralh.
div.l: Ni dhichyn gỽr a chebhn gỽann
Ỿn rhydh i benn mỿnydh maith.
div.p: Ed. Lh. iS. Io. Sal.
ỾRVN phunyd, ỿn ol ỿ dhulh ỿ ma ỿ bernir, pann oſoder lhaỽer o‘eiriau ỿghhyd, a bhont ỿn terbhỿ nu ỿn vnodl; a Thebigdhiỽedhiad ỿ gelỽir.

div.head: Eghraph.
div.p: Ỿdhulh honn a adnebỿdhir, pan na bo dỿchỽeliad ỿn ỿr araith eithr goreiriau.
AR HỾNNY pan bho‘r araith ỿn lhuoſſaỽgo eiri au ỿn ỿr vn treigl, ac ỿn vnodl: neu ‘n gỿphelyb ỿ lhỿthỿrau diỽedhabh i bob vn; Cỿnhebigodl ỿ gelỽir, bhal hynn myỽn prỿdỿdhiaeth.
Tadmaeth, mammaeth, lhaeth, a lho.

div.head: II.
div.p: Dulh aralh ar dhadỿmchỽel ỿ ſydh, pan adrodhir ỿn ỿ diỽedh ỿr vn gair ỿn bendant.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.l: A ni phrophỽydaſom ni ỿn dỿ enỽ di?
A ni bhỽriaſſom alhan gỿthrellieit ỿn dỿ enỽ di?
A ni ỽneuthom ỽyrthiau ỿn dỿ enỽ di?
div.p: Aralh.

Ỿ dyn ſỽydhỿmgais ỿn gỿntabh a bhỿnnei bhod ỿn neſſa at
ỿ goreu; ỿn ol hỿnny a bhỿnnei bhod ỿn ogỿſtadl a‘r goreu; ỿn dhiỽedha a bhỿnnei bhod vỽchlaỽ ‘r goreu. Gỽelỽch ỿma bhod yr vn gair ỿn dyỽedhu ỿ bannodau gỽahannod a chỿbhannod.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Antur o dỽylh ond trỽy deg.
div.p: Aralh.
Ỿ mae ‘r dhulh honn ỿn adhurnaỽd maỽr i Phraethineb ac ỿn cadỽ‘r ſain ỿn hỽy o amſer ỿm medhỽl ỿ gerandaỽyr.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Gochelỽch arbher dhadỿmchỽel ỿn rhy bhỿnych ỿn ỿr vn araithỽriaeth; o achos ỿ gỽedhai ‘n ỽelh i‘r araith ỽrth ei chỿmryd ỿn arbedus neu ei thanu ỿn odeneu ac ỿn aghhỿſpelh

div.head: XXV. PENNOD.
Am Ail ỿmgyrch.
div.p: AIL ỿmgyrch yỽ dulh ar oſodiad geiriau; ſebh, pan gỿmerir ỿr vnrhyỽ ſain ỿn nechrau, ac ỿn niỽedh vn bhannod.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Ochỽi drebhydh diobhalus! ỿn ol blỿnỿdhoedh a dỿdhiau ỿ gỿrrir braỽ arnoch chỽi, drebhỿdh diobhelus. Iſa. 34.
Aralh.
Lhaỽenỿchỽch ỿn ỿr arglỽydh, drachebhn medhabh, lhaỽenỿchỽch. Philip. 4. 4. Gỽolỽch bhod ỿ gair lhaỽenỿchỽch ỿn nechreu‘r bhannod, a‘r vn gair eilchỽyl ỿn diỽedhu‘r bhannod.

div.head: Myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.p: Incert. Author.
Aralh.
div.l: Dedỽydh bhu, daed oedh ei bhyd:
div.p: T. Aledi‘r T. Sal. hen.

div.head: I.
div.p: DVLH ARALH ar ailỿnngyrch ỿ ſydh, pan adrodhir ỿ cỿphelyb, a‘r cydodl vnſain ỿn gỿdỽedh, ỿn nochreuad a dỿỽedhi ad vn bhannod. bbal hynn.
div.l: Hedh a ỿmlyn ỽrth ỿ dyn a gymro amỿnedh.
Callon ỽrol a ỽnaiph dhibheth obhalon.
div.p: Gỽelỽch bhod ỿ ſain lon ỿn ỿ gair cỿntabh ỿn vnỽedh a hon, ſy‘n dỿỽedhu ỿ bhannodaỽl ỿmadrodh.

div.head: II.
div.p: PAN BHO ‘r vn gair priod ỿn dechreu, ac ỿn dỿ ỽedhu ỿr vn bhannod, ac nid gair cỿphredin; Attilh ỿ gelỽyr: ac ỿno ỿr ail gair ſydh o arỽydhocad anſodaỽl: bhal hynn.
Arthur ỿn ỿ bhudhigoliaeth honno a‘m dhangoſodh ỿn Arthur.
Ỿ gair priod hỽnn ſydh ỿn dỿỽedhu ỿ bhannod, ſydh ỿn arỽydhocau rhinỽedh bhileraeg, dhynaỽl, myỽn Arthur.

div.head: III.
div.p: PAN BHO ‘r vn gair cỿphredin ỿn nechrau ac ỿn niỽedh ỿr vnbhannod; Gỽahanblyc ỿ gelỽr. bhal hynn.
Phỿſỿgỽr iacha dỿ hun os ỽyt ti Phỿſỿgỽr.

Ỿ gair dỿỽedhaỽl ỿma ſy n ar ỽydhocau cỿỽreintrỽydh ỿ phỿſỿgỽr, ar gỽybodaeth ỿ ſy ỿndho. Herỽydh paham rhaid
i‘r gair a dhiỽedho ỿn ỿ phygr honn, bhod ỿn nerthaỽg i arỽydhocau cỿphredinaeth.

div.head: IIII.
div.p: RHITH aralh ar ailỿmgyrch a elỽir Catblyc, ỿſydh phyrbh ỿmadrodh; pan bho lhaỽer o rannau ‘r araith ỿn dechreu ar vnrhyỽſain, a diỽedh cỿnnibher ỿn vnſain, ac vnodl. Mae hi ỿn amgỿphred dỽy o‘r rhei vchod ỿndhi; ſebh, edryd, a darỿmchỽel.
Mae hi o amryỽ ỽedh.

div.head: I.
div.p: Ỿn gỿntabh pan adrodhir ỿr vnỽedh nubherſain ỿn nechreuad, a diỽedhiad amryỽ bhannodau: bhal hynn.
Aralh.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.p: G. Gryg.
Ỽele ſylhabheu diỽedhol ỿ geiriau cỿntabh; ſebh Hỿỽel a Hael ovn ỽedh nubherſain, a hebhyd ỿ geiriau diỽedha ỿn vn ſain; rhei ynt megys ỿn lhiỽio ‘r dhulỽedh honn ac ỿn trỽſsio ‘r ỿmadrodh ỿn hỿglyỽ.

div.head: II.
div.p: Ỿr ailỽedh ſydh pan adrodhir ỿr vnrhyỽ ‘eiriau ỿn ỿ dechreuad, a‘r vnrhyỽ ỿn ỿ dỿỽedhiad.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Derbỿnniỽch ni: ni ỽnaethom gamỽedh i nebun; ni aurhei thiaſſom nebun; ni ſommaſom nebun. 2. Cor. 7.
Aralh.
div.l: Pỽy a ladhodh ei bham? Nero.
Pỽy a ladhodh ei ỽraig? Nero.
Pỽy a ladhodh ei athraỽr? Nero.
Pỽy a ladhodh ei gỿbhorỽr? Nero.
Pỽy o‘r diỽedh a‘i lhadhodh ei hun? Nero.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.p: Aralh.
div.l: Aer i dhỽy nain hardhiaỽn yỽ;
Aer Berain yỽ, bur iaỽn ỽaed.
div.p: S. Bhỿ. i Io Sal. o Leỽ. eſc.
Ỿmae‘r dhulh ỿmma ỿn gỽaſaneuthu ‘r nỽydau, ỿn bodhau ‘r gluſt, ac ỿn adhurno ‘r araith; drỽy nabo goramledh o rannau idhi, na gormod o aelodau i bỿlu ‘r clỿbod.

div.head: IIII.
div.p: DVLHARALH ar ailỿmgyrch ſydh, pan adrodhir ỿr vn gair ỿn niỽedh, a dechreu‘r bhannod ỽahannodaỽl: hagen ỿn ỿ diỽedh ỿn arỽy dhocau rhyỽ beth gỽrthỽyneb, neu o‘r hynn lheiabh, ỿn aghbỿphelyb i‘r lhalh ỿn ỿ dechrau. Hia elỽir Gỽrthỿmgyrch.

div.head: Eghraph.
div.p: Gobhal dhyn ỿn dỿ ib heghctid am ỿ peth, ỿ alh dỿ rỽydho a‘th rhỿdhau o bob gobhal.
ỿ gair gobhal ỿn ỿ dechreuſy ‘n arỽydhocau medhỽl o bhlaenlhaỽ, ar geiſio rheidi au erbyn amſer adhaỽ. Onyd ỿn ỿ dyỽ edh, ỿ mae‘r vn gair ỿn arỽydhocau dirbhigh obhn ỿ medhỽl. a chnobha diobhalỽch.

div.head: XXVI. PENNOD.
Am Dhadỿmchỽeliad.
div.p: DAdỿmchoel yỽ phygr, pann adrodhir ỿr vn rhyỽ ſain ỿn nechreu, ag ỿgh gh hannol bannod: neu ỿgh ghhannol, ac ỿn niỽedh bannod: bhalhynn.

div.head: Eghraph.
div.p: Ỿ neb a ‘mdhirietto ỿn ei haedhedigaethau ei hun, ebh a ſommir; a‘r neb a ſommir drỽy ỽybod, ni haedheu‘obrged.
Aralh.
Gỽeithred vbhudhdod a ganbhỿdhir ỿ‘or amlỽg, ac nid gỽeithred bhalch; canys gỽeithred orcheſtaỽl yỽ: eithr mal ỿ dỿỽedeis nid gỽeithred bhalch; anyd gỽeithred vbhudhdod.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.p: Gỽelỽch ỿ gair gỽrol ỿn dechreu a‘r vnrhyỽ air ỿn ỿ cenol; dỿna rann gỿntabh ỿ phygr. Gỽelỽch ‘ỽedi hỿnny ỿ gair trugarog ỿn ỿ cenol, ac ỿn ỿ diỽedh. Dyna ‘r rhann aralh i‘r phygr. Ỿr vn modhyỽ. Medhỽ, rhy bhedhỽ, rhỿ bhedhaỽd medhỽ, ni bu rỿ bhedhỽ, nabai rỿ bhedhaỽd.

div.head: II.
div.p: Dulh aralh ar dhadỿmchoeliad ỿ ſydh, pann adrodhir geiriau ỽ yneb ỿ gỽrthỽyneb. Gỽrthneỽid yỽ ei henỽ.

div.head: Eghraph.
div.l: Bid yỽ‘ch chỽech bỿỽyd o‘ch iaith,
Bỿỽyd o‘ch iaith bid yỽ‘ch chỽech.
div.p: Io. Deỽl. i S. R. ap Tomas.
Aralh.
div.l: A chael i mi echel menn:
Echel menn a chael i mi:
div.p: D. ap Edm. i‘r T. Sal. hen.

div.head: III.
div.p: Dulh aralh ar dhadỿmchoeliad ỿ ſydh, pann adrodhir ỿ cỿbhan bhlaenoraỽg. Ỽrth ei rannau, dan arỽydhocau amrithder ỿn ỿ rhannau, ỿ rheini a dhoſperthỽyd. bhal hynn.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Ỿr ỿdym ni ỿn berarỽynt Criſt, ỿn ỿ rhein a achubir, ac ỿn ỿ rhein a gỿbhrgolhir: i‘r nailh ỿn arogl agheu i agheu: ir lhailh ỿn arogl bỿỽyd i byỿỽyd. Per arỽynt yỽ‘r cỿbhan; ỿ parthoedh yỽ‘r achubedig, a‘r colhedig; ỿr amryỽder yỽ agheu i‘r nailh, abỿỽyd i‘r lhailh.

div.head: IIII.
div.p:
Dulh aralh ar dhadỿmchoeliad ỿ ſydh, pann dhỿſperthir ỿ rhannau cyn ei datcan, ac ỿn ol hỿnny ei trebhym, ai manegu ỿn
dhiamỽedh. Hỿdrebhnid yỽ ei henỽ.

div.head: Eghraph.
div.p: Tri pheth ỿ ſaydh, ỿ mae lhaỽer ỿn ei rhỿbỿchu. Golud, digribhỽch, ac anrhỿdedh. Golud yỽ mamaeth pechod, ac anỽiredh. Digribhỽch yỽ merch anſỿberỽyd, ỿn arỽein i ‘reſỿndaỽd. Anrhỿdedh yỽ mam a mamaeth pob gỽegi.
Aralh o‘r ſcruthur lan.

Ỿ pedỽar hynn bỿchein ynt a goiſel; hagen doethineb ynt; tra doethineb. Ỿ myỽion, pobl, ỽann hagen ỿn paratoi idhynt amſer habh. Lhỿgod ỿ mỿnydh, pobl annerthaỽg, hagen ỿn goſod adail ei tai ỿn ỿ graig. Ar ỿ ceiliogod rhedyn nid oes brenhin; hagen gỽerſỿlhant ỿn bhỿdhinaỽg. Ỿ gob a dheil a‘i dỽỿlaỽ, honn ſy ‘n lhỿſoedh ỿ brenhinoedh. Dih. 30. 24.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Ỽrth ỿ marbher a‘r dhulh honn, gỽiliỽch bhod ỿn bhyrgobhus, a golhỽgh heibio dhatcan rhei o‘r rhannau a dhỿſperthỽch ỿn ỿ cỿphredinaỽl. Mal ỿ gỽnaeth ỿr vn a dhaỽodh dheoghlu deudhec mannau‘r Gredo ac ni dhoeth iỽ gobh ond naỽ o honynt.

div.head: XXVII. PENNOD.
Am Argỿbhenỽiad.
div.p: ARgỿbhenỽ ſydh dhulh, pann dhigỽỿdho (ỽrth neỽidiad ardhodiad neu dhiſodhiad, a‘i lhỿthỿren, ỿnt au ſylhabh) gỿbhneỽidio‘r arỽydhocad.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p:
Carmi ỽyr Hacar. 1. Chro. 2. 7. ỿ gair, neu ‘r henỽ Hacar, a oſodỽyd ỿma ỿn lhe Hacan, hỽnn oedh ei henỽ priod. A nid ỿr ſcruthur lan (ỽrth dỿnny ỿmaeth ỿ lbỿthỿren N, a rhodhi
ỿn ei lhe) a‘i henỽodh ebh, Hacar, o achos mai ebh oedh ỿn aghhỿttedhu ỿr olh Iſrael. Ỿr vn modh ỿ gelhir dỿỽedyd, Nid merch, ond march; nid gỽledh, ond cledh; nid bonedhig; ond penhoedhig.

div.head: Myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.p: D. Ed. i‘r To. Sal. hen.
Aralh.
Ioan. Phyl.

Gorcheſt ỿ dhulh honn ſydh, pann dhigỽydh idhi ſỿrthio ar ỽrthỽynebion: ſebh, o bydh ỿ nailh ‘air ỿn ỽrthỽyneb i‘r lhalh; bhal hynn. Nid meddru: ond methu. Gỽelỽch bhod ỿma ỿmgỿphelỿbiad ar ‘eiriau o amrabhaela gỽrthỽynebus arỽydhocad.

div.head: XXVIII. PENNOD.
Am Amdhỿchỽel.
div.p: AMdhỿchỽel luoſodl ỿ ſydh, pann neỽidir ỿr vnrhyỽ air, y amryỽ dhỿchỽeliadau, neu ribh, neu genetlryỽ, neu dhynſaỽd, neu rithogaeth, neu bhodh, neu amſer, mal ỿ godhebho‘r iaith, ai‘r cỽbl, ai rhai o‘rhein.

div.head: Eghraph.
div.l: Gỽr a ỽna gỽyr ỿn ei ol:
Gỽyr a ỽna ‘r gỽr ỿn ỽrol.
div.p: Aralh.
div.l: Pann na ỽedha atteb pann dh ỿỽettoch.
div.p: Gỽelỽch ỿma, ỿ geiriau hynn gỽybỿdhoch, gỽydoch, gỽybuoſt, ei bod hỽy ỿn amryỽ amſeroedh, a dỿnſodoedh, o‘r vn rhyỽ ‘orair. nid oes arbher o honn ỽrth neỽid terbhỿnau, ỽrth dreiglaỽ enỽ cadarn; am nad yỽ ‘n diethro ỿn ỿ diỽedh, mal ỿ Lhadineg, a‘r Grỿỽeg; eithr ỿn ỿ dechreu drỽy ardhodiad; mal ỿr Hebraeg, neu Arabaeg.

div.head: XXI. PENNOD.
Am Dhulỽedh Braỽdheg ag iſod am Dhirlais.
div.p: DVlhỽedh braỽdheg ſydh phygr, a lhuniaith ỿn lhiỽio, ac megys ỿn rhodhi aphaeth ar ỿr holh bhraỽdheg, ar ſỿnỽyr, drỽy ỿmmodbhryd goreiriaỽl. A‘i rhithoedh ſy‘n callyn.
Dirlais yỽ phygr, a adnebỿdhir ỽrth ỿr aroreir lhabharus, neu ‘r tabhlodiad. Can ỿs dulh ar ỿmadrodh yỽ, pan bho ‘r araraithiỽr megys ỿn dolebhu ỿn vehel, o ran rhyỽ gỿnnỽrbh ỿn ỿ medhỽl, a‘r nỽydau.

div.head: I.
div.p: Ỿ DHVLH gỿntabh, pan bho ‘r araithiỽr ar ei ỿmadrodh ỿn rhỿbhedhu am ryỽ beth. Hia elỽir Rhỿbhedheb.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p:
O bheint dỿbhnder golud doethineb, a gỽybỿdhiaeth Duỽ.
Mor anchỽiliadỽy yỽ ei bharneu ebh, a‘i phyrdh ỿn anbheidraỽl. Rom. 11.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Ni dhỿleid arbheru ‘r dhulh honn, onyd pann bho achos maỽr ỿn peri; a hỿnny ỿn anbhỿnych. Ni ỽedha ei rhoi ỿn nechreu ‘r araithỽriaeth: na chỽaith ỿn niỽedh araithaỽc ỿmadrodh, honn a ỽedhe bhod ỿn oer, ac yn arabh.

div.head: II.
div.p: ỾR AIL dhulh ỿ ſydh, pan bho i‘r araithiỽr regu, cablu, malhdigo rhyỽ beth, neu ryỽ dhyn drỿgionus, ỽrth dherchabhu ei lebh. Hi a elỽir Rheg.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Argledhiet ỿr annuỽiol arno; ac eiſledhed ỿ gỽrthnebỽr ar ei dheheulaỽ: pann rodhir barn arno, colher ebh: a throer ei ỽedhi ỿn bechaỽd. Pſal. 109. 6.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Rhaid yỽ gochelyd rhac i nebun arbheru ‘r dhulh honn, o dhiethr ỿn erbyn annuỽioldeb annodhebhadỽy, ac nid er gelỽ anid i arỽydhocau pa rei ỿ mae duỽ ỿn ei malhdigo.

div.head: III.
div.p: Ỿ DRỾDEDH dhulh ſydh, pann bho i‘r araithiỽr dhamuno rhyỽ beth ar ei ỿmadrodh araithiaỽl. Hi a elỽir Damuneb.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Och Dhuỽ na thorrid ỿ maeth ỿr rhei a‘ch abhlonỿdhant. Ga. 5.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Na boch gỽaeth, na neb och gỽyr!
Na bo ni heb Ỿ ỽain hael!
div.p: Io. Tyd.

div.head: IIII.
div.p: Ỿ BEDỼAREDH dhulh ſydh, pann bho ‘r araithiỽr ar ỿmadrodh ỿn ardhangos galarbhryd; neu bhod ỿn dỽyn toſturi ỽrth ryỽ drueni; ai a bho ỿndho ei hun, ỿntau ỿn erailh. Hi a elỽir Galareb.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan.
div.p: O pỿ rhon i‘m penn bhod ỿn dhỿbhroedh a‘m lhỿgaid ỿn rheidr o dhagreu, i ỽylo dhydh a nos am gelanedhion merch bhỿ mhobl. Ier. 9. 1.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Am erchỽyn ỿ marchaỽg o‘r gogledh;
Cloi‘r bỽrdh; clai ar ỿ bedh;
div.p: T. Al. i S. To. Sal.
Aralh.
div.l: Gỽae bhi o‘r abhlỽydh i dramgỽydhaỽ!
Gỽae bhi o‘r golhed; gỽae bhi o‘r dỿghed!
Gỽae bhi o glỿỽed, bhod clỽybh arnaỽ!

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p:
Rhaid yỽ gochelyd lhac bod ỿ galarnad nac ỿn phugiol; nac ỿn gerdhoteiaỽl; nac ỿn dhiobhal; neu ‘n dhiobhydh; nid amgen, pann bhor galar ỿn bhaỽr, a‘r achos ỿn bhỿcan; mal ỿ gỽna plantys ỽrth ỽylo ‘n hidl am golhi ‘r tlỿſyn lheiabh. neu ỿntau,
pann bho ‘r galarnad ỿn lhai nac yỽ ‘r achaỽs; mal ỿ gỽna dỿnion chỽelan diobhal.

div.head: V.
div.p: ỾN BVMMED pann bho i‘r araithiỽr geiſio cannorthỽy drỽy ỿmdhirgỽyn. Hi a elỽir Gabhargỽyn.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Pam ỿ ſebhi cỿn belhed o dhiỽrthym Arglỽydh, ac ỿr amgudhi ỿn amſer cỿmelri.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Och ỽyr toſt nyd chỽareu teg,
div.p: Ed. Pr.

div.head: VI.
div.p: Ỿ CHỼECHED dhulh ſydh, pann bho‘r araithiỽr ỿn bendithio ar ei ỿmadrodh ryỽ dhỿnſaỽd, am ei dhaoni. Hi a elỽir Hỿdhith.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Bendigedig yỽr gỽeiſion, rhein, pann dhelo ei harglỽydh, a gephir ỿn ephro!

div.head: Myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.p: L. Daron.
Aralh.
div.l: Bendith tra bho gỽlith ỿn ỿ glynn
A rois i Rys, ỿn tỿỽyn:
Tra bho ‘r muroedh lhe i‘r oedhyn,
Na maim, neu bridh ỿ myỽn brynn.
div.p: D. Nantmor.

div.head: VII.
div.p: Ỿ SEITHBHED dhulh ỿ ſydh, pann bho i‘r araithiỽr rodhi lhỽ ar ei ỿmadrodh, er mỽyn cadarnhau ‘r peth ſy‘n gobhyn gỽiỽogaeth dỿſtion. Hi a elỽir lhỿbheb.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Ỿr ỽybhi‘n galỽ nebh a daiar hedhyỽ ỿn eich erbyn, dỿbhethir chỽi o‘r tir, ỿr vn ỿdhych ỿn mỿned iỽ bhedhiannu dros ỿr Iordhonen! Deut. 4. 20.
Aralh.
Duỽ ſyn dyſt i mi, ỿr hỽnn ỿ dhỽybh ỿn ei ỽaſaneuthu ỿn bhỿ ỿsbryd! Rhubh 9.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Gochelỽch ar ỿmadrodh dỿghu i dhim ond i‘r creaỽdỽr; na thỿghu chỽaith i gỿbhlaỽni aniniaỽndeb; na thỿghu ỿn orchỽi dr, neu ỿn dhihamdhenus; na thỿghu i dỽylho nebun; an thỿghu ar ỿmadrodh ſathredig; na mỿnych arbher lhỽ ar ỿmadrodh araithiaỽl.

div.head: VIII.
div.p: ỾR ỼYTHBHED dhulh ỿ ſydh, pann bho ‘r araithiỽr, ỿn ol adrodh neu ỽedi cỽpplau rhyỽ ỽeithred, ỿn goſod braỽdheg ỿn gorỿmdhỽyn ei chloedigaeth. Hi a elỽir Arlebh.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan.
div.p: Ỿn gỿntabh, i gloi ỿmadrodh adrodhedig. Bhelhy mor gadarn ỿ tỿbhodh gair duỽ, ac ỿr ỿmgrỿbhaodh! Act. 19. 20.
Ỿn ail, i gloi araith bribhadỽy, bhal hyn. Ỽele! nỿni a adaỽſom bob peth, ac a‘th dhỿlỿnaſſom di! Matth. 19. 27.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: A dry bhỿ mhỽynt drỽy bhỿ mhais,
Oh! Cael dig am goelio dyn;
Cael obhn draỽ coelbhain a drig;
Coelio a bhu (er celu ei bhod)
Bỿ rhon olh a bỿrrhau‘n nydh.
div.p: Gr. ap Ebh.
Mae ‘r dhulh honn ỿn gỽaſaneuthu ‘n hỿlỽydh i ardharigos cỿdbhryd i beri rhỿbhedhu am ryỽ beth, neu i gỿmmenny‘r araith neu ‘r ỽeithred.

div.head: IX.
div.p:
Ỿ NAỼED dhulh a clỽir Eoneg, ſebh pann bho ‘r Araithiỽr ỿn manegi ỿn hỿdraeth ar araith hỿbhebaỽg. An.
hỿnny bho elhir galỽ ‘r dhulh honn ỿn gennad ỿr ỿmadrodh. O blỿgid ỽrth ỿ dhulh honn, ỿr ỿsbỿſir i bhrenhinoedh ag i ỽyr vchelradh (megys ſỽydhogion gorſedhaỽl) beth ỿ bo cỿdỽybod a cỿbhioỽnder ỿn erioli arnynt.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Adolỽyn na chỿmmerỽch dhỿnſaỽd nebun; a cher-bronn dyn nid arbherabh o rag ỿmadrodh. Nid ỽy bhi‘n arbher cỿbhenỽi; can ỿs ỿchỿdigin pỿd arbherỽn, bho ‘m dỿge ‘r neb a ‘m gỽnaeth i. Iob. Ỿn ỿ geirieu hynn, mae Iob ỿn hỿdraeth' ag ỿn eoniaỽn ỿn dangos ei bhedhỽl ỿn dhiragrith.
Aralh.

Ai pregethu ‘r ỽybh athraỽiaeth dỿnion, ai eidho Duỽ? Ai ceiſto ‘r ỽybh rỿghu bodh dỿnion? Can ỿs os rhỿghỽn bhodh i dhỿnion, nis bỿdhỽn ỽas Criſt. Gal. 1. 10. Ỽele dhangos pa bhodh ỿ mae i ‘ỽeiſion Criſt ỿmdhỽyn tuagat ỿ byd; ſebh dangos ỿn hybh, araithio ‘neon, cerỿdhu ‘n dhirdoſt, a dỿỽedyd ỿn dhiragrith i‘r bỿdolion, mai poen bhydh diỽedh ei paradỽys.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Ỿ nos ỿ medhỽant: ỿ dydh ỿ cỿſcant:
Ỿn ſegur heb labhur ỿr ỿmborthant:
div.p: Talieſsin.

Dỿma araithio ‘n dhiragrith, ỿn erbyn ỿ prỿdỿdhion, oedhent ỿn camarbher ei galỽedigaeth, ac ỿn dirỿỽ io o dhiỽrth reoledigaethau, rhein a bhuaſſe‘n hỿỽedh ei callyn, lheſỽedh oi gỽneuthur, a rhinỽedh o‘i harbheru.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Ni ỽedha ‘r dhulh honn ar ỿmadrodh, onyd i ỽr doeth a bhedr ei golod myỽn bann a modh cỿdỽedhol, er mỽyn gochelyd hỿbhder anỽybodus neu annỿmpỽy.

div.head: XXX. PENNOD.
Am Ailgỿỽair.
div.p: AIL gỿỽair yỽ phygr lunỽedhol, ỿn galỽ gair ỿn ei ol ar a dhỿỽetpỽyd vnỽaith; er mỽyn dỿỽedyd ỿn ỽelh, neu ‘n dỿmoreidhiach. Mae‘r dhulh hon ỿn goamllau ‘r araith, drỽy oſod geiriau nerthoccach ỿndhi.

div.head: I.
div.p: Ỽeithiau bho ailgỿỽeirir ỿ gair blaenoraỽg, bhal hynn. Nỿ ni a dhỿgaſſom garr eich bronn chỽi i gael barn, nid lheidr; eithr herỽr agherdhaỽl: nid godinebỽr; eithr ỿſcỿrriỽr pob diỽeirdeb: nid lhanherỽr; eithr gelyn glas pob crebhydh dhuỽiol: nid ỿ mrỿſonỽr; eithr lhaỽrydh aghhardhyn.

Gỽelỽch ỿma gỿỽeirio ‘r gair o bhlaenlhaỽ, er mỽyn egluro ỿn dhilỿſsiach, ac er dangos ỿn brỿſſurach, as a lhaỽn aỽydh ai cỿbhlỽr rhinỽedholi amdhiphin vn; ỿntau cỿphlỽr ‘ỽydus, i dhirỿmgỽyn ỿn erbyn ỿ cỿbhryỽ.

div.head: II.
div.p: ỼEITHIAV erailh bho ailgỿỽeirir ỿ gair ỿn ol dhỿỽedyd, ac nid ỿm mlaen.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Eglur ỿdych bhod ỿn lhethyr Criſt, a ỽaſogỽyd gannym ni aga ſcribhenỽyd nid a du; namyn ac ỿsbryd Duỽ: nid ỿn lhe chi main; eithr ỿgh ghhnaỽdollechi ‘r gallon. 2. Cor. 3. 3. Ỽele! mae ‘r apoſtol ỿn cỿỽeirio ‘r geiriau hein (nid a du) ỽrth roi‘r geiriau ſy‘n callyn, ſebh, namyn ac ỿsbryd Duỽ.
Aralh.
Ond gỽedi i chỽi adnabod Duỽ neu ‘n hỿttrach ỿn ol i Dhuỽ ỿch adnabod chỽi. Eph.
Aralh.

Am dỿ ỽeithred gỽilỿdhus, pa bhodh ith galỽabh? Ai dihirỽr? Nac e anibhel. ai anibhel? nac e, Cỿthrael am ỿ moỽrdhrỽg a‘r methrin ſy ỿnot. Gỽelỽch ỿma gỿỽeirio ‘r gair ỿn ol lhaỽ; er mỽyn peri i‘r gỽrandaỽyr gobhio ‘n ỽelh, a gỽrando ‘n dhỿbhalach, beth ſy i gallyn, a pheth yỽ ei amcan ỽrth bhod ỿn anniben.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Ni bydh vn heb dhỽy enioes;
NA BHV dhim, i‘r nebh ỿdhaeth.
div.p: T. Al. i To. Sal. hen.
Sỿna! mal ỿ mae ‘r prỿdydh ỿn dangos nad oes meichiau rhag marỽ: onyd ỿ mae ebh ỿn cỿỽeirio hỿnny ỿn ol, ac ỿn dangos, nad marỽ a bhu, eithr byỽ ỿn ỿ nebhoedh.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Rhaid i‘r gair cỿỽeiriaỽl, a rhodhir ỿn ỿ dhulh honn, bhod ỿn rỿmmuſſach, na‘r gair anniben, ſebh, abho ‘n blaenori, neu ‘r vn a gỿỽeirir ỿn olabh. Canys annỿnadrỽydh maỽr bhỿdhe i‘r araithiỽr ỽrthod ỿ gair crỿbha, i gỿbhleu‘r gỽannabh; ac ỿn bhỿdrỽydh a bhỿdhe rhoi geiriau diphaith ỿn ỿr araith, er mỽyn ei gỽelhau neu ‘i cỿỽeirio.

div.head: III.
div.p: Dulh aralh ar ail gỿỽeir ỿ ſydh, pann ‘oſodir gair cỿphredi naỽl o‘r blaen, a gỽedi hỿnny dieithro rhann alhan o hono, neu ryỽ amgenedigaeth.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Ỿr ỿdis ỿn Gorthrỿmmu o bob parth er hỿnny nid ym myỽn cỿbhighder: ỿdh ym myỽn cỿbhigh gỿghor; er hỿnny nid ỿn dhigỿghor: ỿdhys ỿn ein ỿmlid; ac ni‘n gadeỽir: ỿdhym ỽedi ‘n tabhlui laỽr, eithir ni‘n colhir. 2. Cor. 4.
Tabhlu i laỽr yỽ ‘r cỿphredin. Ỿ gair colhir ỿỽ rhann; honn a dhigerthỽyd o‘r lhalh, oedh ỿ cỿphredin.
Aralh.

Gorſedh ỿ brenhin ſydh ‘ogonedhbhaỽr; eithr ỿn neỽidadỽy. Sỽydhogaethau ſybhelus: er hỿnny ỿn enbỿdus. Cỿỽaeth ſydh dha; eithr ỿn llaỽn cỿmelcit. Bodhion yỽ phrỽythoedh ỿ bỿỽyd: er hỿnny ỿ maent ỿn achoſion greſỿndod a thrueni.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Eithr pe byỽ athro paỽb oedh.
div.p: Io. Cochi D. ap Gỽilim▪

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Gochelỽch bhod ỿ dieithreb ỿn rhỿ gỿbhryỽiaỽl, megys pe dỿỽede vn, Ỿr ym myỽn tlodi; eithr heb arnom eiſiau dim. Nedỽch i‘r dhieithreb bhod ỿn rhy ‘ỽann megys peidỿỽedỽn, Melus yỽ vrdhas: etỽa ỿr ỿdys ỿn dal gỽg idhaỽ. nid yỽ ‘r dhieithreb ỿma ỿn lheihau dim, ar ỿ glod vchod.

div.head: XXXI PENNOD.
Am Attaliaith.
div.p: ATtaliaith yỽ phygr ỿmadrodh pan bho ‘r areithiỽr o ethryb rhyỽ nỽydau, bhegys obhn, diglhonrỽydh, galar, neu ‘ỽylder ỿn celu rhann o ‘r ỿmadrodh, cyn diỽedhu o hono ‘r cỽbl. Bhal hynn.
Dỿỽedabh ỿ peth ſydh ỿn bhỿ medhỽl, ond rhac annoc a bhai pelhach.
Ỿma ỿ gỽelỽch gỿchỽyn o‘r araith o‘r blaen, a darbhod celu peth o honi, o achos ỿ nỽyd oedh ỿn anach ei rhỽydhdeb.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Pe lhai hỽp ỿ lhaỽ happus;
Oes brenn yỽ, nis briỽai‘n vs?
div.p: T. Al. i Io. Sal. Siambrlen Gỽynedh.
Rhaid yỽ dealh bhod ỿr atteb i‘r gobhỿnniad ỿma ỿn gudhiedig iỽ dhealh ỽrth ſỿnỽyr ỿ geiriau.
Aralh.
div.l: Pỿỽys ỿn hai heb Shon hir.
div.p: L. Mon.
Gỽelỽch ỿma attal rhann o‘r ỿmadrodh ỿn ol heb ei dỿỽedyd. Canys dealh ỿdhys Pỿỽys aeth ỿn hai.

div.head: XXXII PENNOD.
Am Gỿbhagỽedh.
div.p: CỾbhagỽedh yỽ phurbh ỿmadrodh, pann bho ‘r araithiỽr ỿn amliaỽs, neu ‘n carnedhu ỿghhyd laỽer o eiriau, ỿn arỽydhocau amrabhael bethau, o‘r vnrhyỽ anian.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Gỽeithredoedh ỿ cnaỽdſy amlỽg: ỿrrhein torpriodas, godineb, abhlendit, nỽybhiant, delỽ-adholiad, ſỽyno caſineb, cỿnnennau, gỽynbhỿdu, lhid, ỿmgeiniau, terbhỿſcau, lhadhiadau, medhdod, glỿthineb, a‘r cỿphelyb. Gal. 5.

div.head: Myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Hỿnod ỽedh hynn yỽ d‘ adhỿſc.
div.p: I. M. i Io. Sal. o Les. eſc.
Aralh.
div.l: Por, clod, nod, nudh, budh, bỿdh in,
div.p: I. Gruph ap Crach o Leyn▪

Gỽelỽch ỿma gỽpplỿſu lhaỽer o ‘eiriau ỿghhyd, a‘i lhỿnglỿmmu. A‘r cỿphelib naturiaeth ar ỿ dhulh honn, ſy‘n debig myỽn gogan, ibhỿnch dhỿrnodiae myỽn rhỿbhel; eithr myỽn clod, a maỽl tebig yỽi gaỽod gurlaỽiog, pann bhỿdhe raid ỽrthi, ſebh ỿn amſer crinſych ỿ dhaiar.

div.head: II.
div.p: Dulh aralh ar gỿbhagỽedh ỿ ſudh, pann bhỽrir lhaỽer o ‘eiriau ỿghhyd, mal cerrig myỽn carnedh, ỿn dhigỿſſỽlht; a‘r rheini ỿn arỽydhocau amryỽ bethau, o amryỽ anian. Digỿſſỽoht ỿ gelỽyr hi.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.p: Io. Cent.
Aralh.
div.l: Dỽr, tan, aỽyr, ſer, terra, a main,
Gỽylht, gỽar, gỽelht, gỽydh, nos, dydh, da
div.p: D. Ed.
Gỽelỽch ỿma garnedhu lhaỽer o ‘eiriau o amryỽ naturiaeth; ac ỽrth hỿnny ỿn ỽrthỽyneb i‘r dhulh gỿntabh.

div.head: XXXIII PENNOD.
Am Dhadỿmchỽelyd.
div.p: DAadỿmchoelyd yỽ phygr, pann dhigỽydho. i‘r araithiỽr droi ỿn dhiſỿmỽth o‘i ỿmadrodh blanoraỽli ỿmadrodh aralh: ſebh, ỿn ol darbhod idho ỿmdhidhan am ryỽ vn neu ryỽ beth, ỿmae‘n dhiattreg ỿn ỿſmudo o‘r trỿdydh dỿnſaỽd‘r ail.
Bho arbherir ỿ dhulh honn ỿn amryỽ ỽedh.

div.head: I.
div.p:
ỾNGỾNTABH, pann dhỿchỽelir ỿr araith at
Dhuỽ, ỿr hynn nid oedh arbhaethus ỿn ỿ dechreuad.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Ỿr anodhyn a‘i cudhiodh hỽynt: hỽy a dheſcennaſſont i‘r dỽbhn eroedh megys carreg. Dỿ dheheulaỽo Arglỽyah a bhaỽrugodh ei hunan i mi drỽy ỽyrth: a‘th. dheheulaỽ, o Arglỽydh, torraiſt ỿ gelyn. Gen. 15. 5, 6. Ỿma a gỽedi i Bhoeſſen dhangos darbhod i‘r dỽbhnabhor ſy gỿnlyn bhodhi‘r Aiphtieit; ỿ mae ỿn troi eilchỽyl ỿn amlỽys, ac ỿn dadỿmchoelyd ei ỿmadrodh at Dhuỽ, megys pỿ bei ỿn ỿmchỽedleuabh ac ebh.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿ dhiaeth.
div.l: Draỽ i‘n rhaid draian ei rodh.
Clyỽ air a chỽyn cleiriach hen.
div.p: Io. Tydh.

div.head: II.
div.p: Ỽeithiau bho ‘ỽrthỿmchoelir ỿr araith at ryỽ dhyn aralh.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Ỿ lhỽ a dỿghodh ỽrch ein tad Abraham; nid amgen bod idho ganiatau i ni, gael ỿmỽared o dhiỽrth dhỽylo‘n gelỿnnion; a‘i ỽaſaneuthu ỿn dhiobhn olh dhỿdhiau‘n bỿỽyd myỽn ſancteidhrỽydh, ac iaỽnder garr ei bhronn ebh. A thithau bhab a‘th elỽir ỿn brophỽyd ỿ goruchabh; canys ti a ei o bhlaen ỽyneb ỿr arglỽydh i baratoi ei phyrdh ebh; ac irodhi gỽybỿdhiaeth o iechyd iỽ bobl ebh, gamn bhadheuant o‘i pechodau. Luc. 1. 73, 74. Gỽelỽch ỿma ỿn ol cỿchỽyn o‘r araith gann dhatcan clod, a maỽrſerch Duỽ ỿn ei rodhedigion dadỿmchoelyd; ac ỿn troi ‘r araith at ỿ dynbach, pann anỽaediỽyd arnobh.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Ỿr vn a‘n rhoes ninnau ‘n rhydh.
I G ỿmru da bhu hyd bhedh
A‘r bhercho Iorc ar bhraich hỽnn.
A‘ion ỽaiỽ melht ỿn ỿ maes.
Holh Phraighc, a‘i thalbhaighc, a‘i thir,
Ỿs da bherch, heudhaiſt ei bhodh.
Ỿ ſtryỽ phydh Heſter, a‘i phỽylh.
O‘s doeth iỽ hoes Iỽdith hael.
Marſia ỽyd am ỿr oes honn.
div.p: Io. Tyd, i‘n graſuſa bhrenhines Eliſabeth.
Ỽele ỿn ol i‘r prỿdydh dhatcan ar ỿmadrodh, riniach ein brenhines: ỿ mae ebh ỿn dadỿmchoelyd, ac megys ỿn ỿmdhidhan ac hi eihun ar ei araith; gan argan dhỿledus gammoliant idhi.

div.head: III.
div.p: ỼEITHIAV aralh bho ỽrthỿmchoelir ỿr araith at ryỽ beth anỿnſodaỽl, malpei ‘n dhỿnſaỽd.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Prophỽydlỽyth Tyrus: Vdỽch chỽi loghau Tarshish; gan dharbhod ei hanialu gan ỿ teulu; gan dhỿbhodieit, gan ỽlad Chittim, ỿ dadgudhir ỿn ei erbyn. Iſ. 23. 1. Ỿma mae‘prophỽyd ỿn araithio ỽrth loghau Tyrus, mal pei baent ỿn dhynſodion rheſỿmmol; ac hỽynt ỿn bhudieit dieneidiaỽg.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿ dhiaeth.
div.l: Tỿ di‘r dhaiar ‘ỽar irad yt hỿnny
Doethym (anoeth bhym) oth bholl ỿn bridhelh,
Ac i‘r vn bhann gỽyro ‘n bh‘ol,
Oni dhel trabhel trebhi; crynn ỽybrenn,
div.p: Io. Tyd.
Gỽelỽch bhod ỿ prỿdydh ỿn araithio ỽrth ỿ dhaiar, honn nid yỽ dhỿnſaỽd, amyn elbhen.

div.head: XXXIIII. PENNOD.
Am Dhỿnſaỽdỽedh.
div.p: DỾ nſaỽdỽedh yỽ phygr, pann bho‘r araithiỽr ar anſaỽdlun ỿn dỽỿn i myỽn ar ỿmadrodh, mal pei ryỽ vn aralh ỿn ỿmdhidhan. Ỿ dhulh honn ſydh dheubh athol: Ainherphaith a Pherphaith.

div.head: I.
div.p: Amberphaith yỽ▪ ſebh pann adgỿnnỿrchir ỿmadrodh rhyỽ vn aralh ỿn lhedỿſcabhn, ac ỿn lhedbrin.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Ond o daỽ biliaỽ, a barn,
Na chỽedl rhỽgh gỽann a cadarn:
Ỿ gỽann a obhyn o gur;
O Dhuỽ tad ble‘dh ai Tydur.
div.p: G. Lhyn.
Ỽele ‘r Prỿdydh ỿn dỽyn i myỽn mal pei ỿmadrodh ỿ gỽr gỽann, ỿn ỿmobh yn am Dydur: nid ar gỿbhlaỽn ỿmadrodh, neu mal pei bei hỿnny ỿn gỽbl ei bhedhỽl; eithr ỿn obrin, ac ỿn ledỿſcabhn.

div.head: II.
div.p:
Perphaith dhynſodlun ſydh, pann bho ‘r, araithiỽr mal pei ỿn dỽyn i myỽn ar araith, gỽbl o ỿmadrodh dỿnſaỽd aralh: neu
ỿntau ỽydhſodi ỿn adgỿnnỿrchiaỽl, me ‘is pei ỿmdhidh an rhyỽ beth aralh.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Pann gaſclỽyd ỿ dỿbhroedh drỽy chỽthod dỿ phroenau di, hỽy a ſabhaſſont mal cỽmỽl: ỿr annodh ỿnnoedh a gỿdỿmỽaſcaſſant ỿ ghhallon ỿ mor: ỿ gelyn a dhyỽedaſſe, Mi a erlỿna; mi a ordhiỽedha: mi a rannabh ỿ praidh: bho a gỿbhlenỽir bhỿ enaid: mi a dhiỽeiniabh bhỿ ghhled: bhỿ lhaỽ a ‘i haỽloga hỽynt i etibhedhiaeth. Gen. 15. Ỿma gỽelỽch bhod Moeſſen ỿn dỽyn ỿmyſc ei ‘madrodhion, ac ỿgh ghhanol ei eiriau ei hun, megys pỿ bei‘r gelyn ỿn dỿỽedyd, ỿn datcan neu‘n ỿmadrodhi ei amcan ỿn erbyn plant ỿr Iſrael.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Er Duỽ o doethoſt i‘r daith,
Dỽtſio ‘r ſir, be doet Sỿr Shon.
Troes Duỽ yỽch bhar triſtỽch bhu,
Daed ei ras i dhuỽ droſobh.
O‘r bỿỽyd byrr, a‘r byd bach.
Dled ar bob dyn dỿchryn daith
Oes vn gỽr a ỽelſom gynt
Ỿ graỽn nes lhỿ gru vnỽaith.
(Ys da nerth) drỽy Griſt a ỽnant
Ỿ ỽledh bhaỽr, a arlỽyodh bho:
Crỿnnỽch hỽnt a‘ch crỽyn i‘ch oes:
Ar Griſt bhry, a‘r groes ỽacd bhronn.
Ỿno ỿ doỽch bob vn, a dau,
Olh i‘r bhan lhe‘r ỽybh innau.
Lhe nid oes na garỽloes gur,
Na dig, na galar nid oes,
Na neỽyn, chỽerỽ dhyn, na chỽyn,
A byỽ ỿn nebh baỽb ỿn iebhagbc,
Heb dreio oes, a heb draghc.
Ac eỽch ỿn iach gỽỿchion ỽyr!
Ỿn iach i ỽr ỿn eich ol.
div.p: Io. Tyd. ỿn dỽyn malpei ỿ marchog S. Io. Sal. ỿn cỿghhori ei blant.

Aml ỿma yỽ, darbhod rhodhi i‘r peth marỽol mud, ỿ peth ſydh ỿn cỿbhanu a thabhodiog. A chyd bo‘r dhulh honn tra arbheredic gann bheirdh, a phrỿdỿdhion: Etto nid anlhai ỿmarbher araithỽyr, a chỽedleuỽyr goamldhoeth o honi, nog hỽyntau.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Rhaid yỽ edrych ỿn ‘obhalus ar bhod rhyỽ achos gỿmmhelhig i beri arbher ỿ dhulh honn. Ỿno rhaid yỽ ei goſod ỿn gỿbh lym, ar arbhaeth: ac ỿn dhiỽedha rhaid yỽ edrych ar ei bod ỿn ỿmpỽyaỽl i bhodhhau.

div.head: XXXV. PENNOD.
Am Betruſad.
div.p: AMheuedigaeth, neu Betruſat ye phygr arluniaỽc, ỿn gobhyn cỿghor ar araith betruſsiaỽc: nid i aralh, namỿn idho ei hun. Canys ỿn ol ỿ dhulh honn ỿ digỽydh i‘r ỿmadrodhỽr dhỽyn ar dhalht, ei bhod ỿn amheu, o rann amledigaeth ỿm-mhle ỿ dechreu; neu beth a dhỿỽaid myỽn rhyỽ beth dierth, petruſaỽg.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Dỿ ỽybodaeth di ſy rỿbhedhach, nac ỿ galhỽybh ei thỽylho: mae hi ỿn vchelaỽg, ni alhabh mo‘i gornerthu. Ible ỿ phoabhi odhiỽrth dỿ ỿsbryd? neu odhiỽrth dỿ ỽyneb? O‘s eſcỿnnỽn i‘r nebhoedh; ỿno‘r ỿdỽyd: pei gỽnaỽn bhỿ ghỽelu ỿn ỿ bedhle; Syna, cỿnnỿrchiaỽl ỽyd. Pei cỿmerỽn adenydh hupunt ỿ dydh, ar bhedr triganedhu ỿn eithaỽedh ỿ mor; ỿno hebhyd dỿ laỽ a‘m tỿỽyſei, a‘th dheheulaỽ a gỿmreu ‘abhel ỿnobh. Pỿ dỿỽedỽn, ỿ tỿỽylhỽc mal hỽyrnos a‘m hamgornant; ỿno bỿdhei‘r nos ỿn oleuni ỿn bhỿ am gỿlch. Pſal. 139.
Ỽele ‘r prophỽyd ỿn ỿmdhidhan ac ebh ei hun, ac megys ỿn ỿmbenbleth myỽn cỿbhingdra medhỽl, ỽrth ỿſtyrrio maỽredh Duỽ a‘i bharnau anniaghcadỽy.

div.head: Myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: O dont, pỽy a‘i lhudh i dir?
div.p: G. Gl.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Ỿ neb a arbhero ‘r dhulh honn ar araith gampuſcain, ỿn gỿntabh na dhỿged i myỽn an araithỽriaeth, nibher mỽy o amheu hadigaethau, nog abhỿdho rheidiol i ỿsbỿſſu goramledh, neu Rỿbhedhodaeth. Ỿn neſſa at hỿnny gocheled amheu lhe, ni bo ond ỿchỿdig achos ỿn peri. Ac ỿn drỿdydh gỽilied rodhi argoel anỽybỿdhiaeth, gan amheu, lhe ni bo dir idho: ac ỽrth hỿnny dangos ei hunan ai ‘n anỽybodus, ai ‘n abyrgobhus.

div.head: XXXVI. PENNOD.
Am Ogỿlchiaith.
div.p: GOgỿlchiaith ſydh phygr draỽſoreurad; trỽſsiad god idaỽg: rhyỽ ỽych daccliad a lhiaỽs o amryỽ eiriau perthỿnaſſol, ỿn ỿſtyn chỽedyl bỿrr o hyd ỿ bỽa; ỿr hỽnn a elhid ei draethu ar dheuair neu dri.

div.head: I.
div.p: Ỿn gỿntabh ỽrth dheoghliet gair, neu ‘i dadogaeth. Megys pỿ dỿỽedỽn ỿn lhe‘r gair philoſophỿdh, bhod vn ỿn caru doethineb: neu ỿntau pei dỿỽedỽn ỿn lhe Criſtion, bhod vn ỿn adholỽr Criſt.

div.head: II.
div.p: Ỿn ail ỽrth dheſcribhiat: ſebh pann bho i‘r araithiỽr dhỿſỽedhu rhyỽ beth ac ar goelion nodadỽy. Megys pei dỿỽed e vn am dhiglhonedh; ei bod ỿn bhrudni ‘r gallon, ỿn gỽneuthud ỿr ỽylh ỿn las, ỿ lhygaid ỿn danlhyr, a‘r corph ỿn grỿnlhyt.

div.head: III.
div.p:
Ỿn drỿdydh ỽrth derbhỿnu anian; a naturiaeth rhyỽ beth▪
Megỿs pei dỿỽedei vn am dhyn, ei bhod ỿn greadur byỽiol
rheſỿmmaỽl: neu am ‘ormỿſdeym, ei bhod ỿn ordrechỽr cỿbhreithiau, a rhỿdhid ỿ ỽladỽriaeth.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Phydh yỽ phyrbhder ỿ pethau a obeithir, ac egluriat ar ỿ pethau nis gỽelir. Heb. 11. 1.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.p: Tyd. Al.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Rhaid i‘r neb a‘r bhero ‘r dhulh honn, bhod ỿn dha ei greth, a‘i gỿngyd, rhac tỿnnu ‘r ogỿlchiaith ỿn rhỿ hir: os bei hỿnny, diau bỿdhe ‘r araith ỿn dhiphrỽyth, gan nad yỽ ‘r dhulh honn ỿn dodrebhnu ‘r araith a debhnydh neỽydh, eithr ac amryỽ eiriau, i lỽydho‘r ỿmadrodhiaith ỽrth ei cỿmryd ỿn arbedus

div.head: XXXVII. PENNOD.
Am Globỿnniaeth.
div.p: CLobỿnniaeth yỽ phygr, pan bho ‘r araithiỽr ỿn dỽyn y myỽn ar ei ỿmadrodh, amrabhael dheſcribhiaeth i‘r vn peth. Megys pei dỿỽedỽn bhal hynn.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Dyn yỽ cnaỽd, gỽynt ỿn mỿned heb dhỿbhod darech ebhu. Pſalm. 78. 39. Glaſỽelht a dorrir, a phrỿbhed ỿ dhaiar. 1. Machabees, 2. 62.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Darn der o hauarn drỽy hydh.
Arni, nog ar dri o‘r drych.
Teneu yỽ ei chorph, teỽ ‘n ei chil:
Ỿn blyc, bbal eỽin ỿ blaidh.
Ỿn lhabhn gỽiỽ, ỿn lhai obhn gỽr,
Vnlhiỽ a‘r haul, ỿn lhaỽ ‘r heliỽr.
div.p: G. Gl.
Aralh.
div.l: Clau gorn, a chic hell a gar;
Corn maỽr ỿmyſc ỿ cyrn man:
Coedỽr a‘i ỽaedh ỿn cadỽr ỽyn;
Mal tarth pann bhai ‘n ỿmlid hydh.
Bric lhebh hyd ar barc ỿ lhys.
Bon trỽmp a‘i benn tu ar iad.
A genau maỽr, ac vn main.
div.p: ỿr vnrhyỽ brỿdydh i gorn huadỽr.
Gỽelỽch ỿma dhỿbhalu ‘r nailh beth i‘r lhalh, ar gỿndhelỽ dheſcribhiad ỿn eglur, ac ỿn honeidlon, idhar ỽydho.

div.head: XXXVIII. PENNOD.
Am Gỿphrediaeth.
div.p: GỾphrediaeth yỽ phygr lunỽedhaỽl, pann bho ‘r araithiỽr ar ei ỿmadrodhiaith ỿn gobhyn cỿghor i erailh, nailh ai i‘r gỽrthbleidiaỽg, ai ỿntau i‘r ỿnad, beth a ỽnei‘r rhag lhaỽ: neu beth a dhỿleſid ei ỽneuthud.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Ỿ no ỿ dỿỽedodh Iehỽda, Beth a dhỿỽedỽn ỽrth bhỿ arglỽydh? Beth a dhỿlebỽnn? neu pa ỽedh ỿ glanhaỽn ein hunain? Gen. 46. Gỽelỽch bhod Iehỽda myỽn cỿbhingder medhỽl, gan ‘orbicr ỽydh cỿdỽybod, o achos ỿ trỿchineb a ỽnaethei ebh a‘i bhrodur ỽrth ỽerthu Ioſeph eibraỽd i‘r Iſmaelieit, ac herỽydh hỿnny ỿ mae ebh ỿma ỿn adrodh ỽrthynt hỽy ỿn gỿgbhorgais, beth a ỽneynt rhac lhaỽ.
Aralh.

Nid yỽ tỿỽyſſogion ỿn obhn i ỽeithredcedh da; anid i‘r rhei
drỽg. A bhỿnni di nad obhnych ỿr aỽdurdod? gỽna dhaoni a chei bholiant gantho. Rhubh. 13. 3. Ỿ ma mae ‘r apoſtol ỿn ỿmgỿghhori a‘r gỿphredineb, pỽy ỽedh ỿ mae i dhyn ỿmdhỽyn tuagat ỿ ſỽydhog; a pha bhodh ỿ daỽ lhes idho o hỿnny.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Ai gỽaeth bhỿ mhennaeth i‘m honn;
div.p: G. Gl. i ỽilim Bhỿchan o Rhaglan bharcog.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Ỿ neb a arbhero ‘r dhulh honn ar ỿmadrodh, edrỿched, ỿn gỿntabh, ar bhod ei achos a‘i arbhaeth ỿn dha, ac ar dir iach: mal na‘s galho ‘r gỽrthneſig ei ỽadu, na‘r ỿnad bheio arno, heb ledorthrech cỿbhiaỽnder, a gỽyro rhaithlod iniaỽndeb, a gỽir ionedh.

div.head: XXXIX. PENNOD.
Am Danſaghiad.
div.p: TAnſaghiad neu bhlaenoriaeth yỽ phygr lunỽedhol, pann bho ‘r araithiỽr ỿn gỽeled o bhlaen lhaỽ, beth a elhid ei bhỽrỽ ỿn eierbyn iỽ bhriỽo: gann dhirỿmmio, a diuerthu, cyn cael o‘r caſdhyn,. neu‘r gỽrthbleidiaỽc amſer na ham dhen i bhỽrỽ hỿnny ỿn ei dheſcil.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p:
Dỿỽedi gann hỿnny ỽrthybh. Pa ‘m ỿ mae ebh ỿn cỽyno? Canys pỽy a ỽrthladhodh ei ỽỿlhys ebh? Eithr a dhyn! Pỽy
ỽyt ti a ‘mdhadleui ỿn erbyn Duỽ? Adhỿỽeit ỿ peth phurbhedig, ỽrth ỿr hỽnn a‘i phurbhiodh; Pam i‘m gỽnaethoſt bhal hynn? Rhubh. 9. Gỽelỽch ỿma bhod Paỽl ỿr apoſtol ỿn rhacabhaelu ỿn hỿdhoeth ar reſỿm ỿ dyn cnaỽdol, gan atteb idhi ỿn dhiỽrthladh.
Aralh.

E dhỿỽaid rhyỽ vn, Pa bhodh ỿ cỿbhodir ỿ meirỽ? A pharyỽ gorph ỿ deuant alhan? A ỿnbhyd! ỿ peth ỿdhỽyd ỿn ei heu, ni bhỿỽocceir, o dhieithr idho bharỽ. 1. Cor. 15. Ỽele r apoſtol ỿn dỽyn ar dhalht i‘r ſaỽl, ni choelient ỿ deue cỿbhodiadigaeth ỿ meirỽ, drỽy ragoſod ei am-mhỽylhbhryd, nad iaỽn oedh idhynt amheu hỿnny, ar gỿphelybrỽydh trebhn anian naturiol, a gỽeladỽy.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Boſt ỿr iaith ma‘i boſtiỽr ỽy:
Ni ledhir o rad talad ỽy;
Ỿ gair maỽr ond a gair mỽy.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Rhaid yỽ gochelyd ỿn ỿ dhulh honn rhac deu beth. Ỿn gỿntabh rhac rhoi ar araith, neu myỽn ỿmadrodh arbhỽriadau rhrodreſcar, a gỽagaidh. Ỿn ail rhac bod o‘r attebion ỿn ỽann, ac ỿn annigonaỽl canys pei hỿnny, gỽanny cheu ei achos eihun, ac a nerthoccai bhỽriad gỽrthaỽlydh.

div.head: II.
div.p: Dulh aralh ar danſaghiad ſydh, pann bho‘r araithiỽr ỿn rhoi atteb i‘r peth a obhỿnnodh ebh ei hun; ac hi elỽir Lhedỿmdhỽyn.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Pỽy a ỽarthebaiſt? pỽy a geblaiſt? ỿn erbyn pỽy ỿ codeiſt dỿ lais? ỿn dhiau, di a dherchebheiſt dỿ lỿgaid ỿn erbyn ſant ỿr Iſrael. Iſ. 37. Gỽelỽch bhod ỿ prohhỽyd ỿn gobhyn, mal pei, i Rabſace ac ỿn adliỽio idho ỽneuthud ỿ camỽedh tỿrhauſlon a‘ỽneutheſſei a Duỽ.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Yn ol gair Duỽ diỽair doeth.
Mi a‘th geiſiais dan bhais ỿn bhyỽ;
div.p: G. Genold. Ỿn odidog.
Aralh.
H. Sal. ar Ỿ xv. Pſ. 1588.

div.head: XL. PENNOD.
Am Gỿnatauad.
div.p: CỾnatauat ſydh phygr lunỽedhaỽl, pann bho ‘r araithiỽr ỿn ỿmdhiried ỿn dhirbhaỽr iỽ achos, ac ỿn cỿnadu i‘r ỿnadoedh, i‘r cardhyn, neu i‘r caſdhyn, ei gỿbhỿſtyr ỿn dhiragor, ac ỿn dhiragrith: ac ỽrth hỿnny o naỽdh, i bharnu am dano mal ỿ bo‘r achos ỿn peri: o‘s drỽg, ei dhibharnu; os da, ei bribholi.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p:
O‘s rhodieis myen gỽegi, neu o prỿſſurodh bhỿ nhroed at
dhichelh. Eſſabhied bhi myỽn clorrian eỿbhiaỽnder, a gỽypped Duỽ ỽdhiỽrth bhỿ ghhỿbhanrỽydh. O treiglodh bhỿ ghhamreu o dhiỽrth ỿ phordh honno; ac o‘s bhỿm mryd a ganlỿnodh bhỿ lhỿgaid: neu ỿntau, o glyn dim ỽrth bhỿn nỽylaỽ: ỿ peth a heuỽybh bỽỿtaet aralh: a diỽreidher bhỿm mlaguroedh. Iob. 31. 5. Ỿn ỿ geiriau ỿma mae Iob ỿn ỿsbỿſſu, ar ba ryỽ beth ỿ mae ei iniaỽndeb ebh ỿn gobỽyſo: febh, ei bhod ỿn aneuoc; ac ỿn anniỽedus ger bronn dynion, heb pechu o hono ebh, ỿngỿhoedhus, ỿn erbyn ỿr ail dabhlan o‘r gỿbhraith.
Aralh.

Ai iaỽn yỽ ỿgh gholỽg Duỽ, vbhudhau i chỽi, ỿn hỿttrach ai i dhuỽ; bernỽch chỽi. Act. 4. Ỽrth ỿ geiriau hein mae‘r apoſtolion ỿn cỿnadu i‘r caſdhỿnnion bharnu‘r arglỽydhaỽd dhugiedic, heb ỽannỿchu na lheſcau dim o nerth ei ỿmadrodh, na chỽaith lheſcau ar ei cỿngyd arbhaethaỽl.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth.
div.l: Pỿ bai gỽelht, a‘r manỽelht man,
A‘r graỽn ir, a‘r gro‘n arian:
div.p: Gỽelỽch bhod ỿ bardh ỿn cỿnadu‘r argỽydhod, heb dhirymnio dhim olh ar ei amcan bỽriadus.

div.head: II.
div.p:
Dulh aralh ar Cỿnatauat ſydh, pann odhebho‘r araithiỽr bhỽrỽ rhyỽ beth ỿn ei erbyn, gann dhỽyn i myỽn ryỽ beth aralh, i gỿdodhe a‘r bỽriad blaenoraỽg, bhal hynn. Ni alhabh ỽadu nad yỽr phordh i gaphael dyſc, a doethineb ỿn deithir, ac ỿn boenlhyt; ỿ dhrighbha ỿn ſerth, ac ỿn lhithraỽg; ỿr amſer
ỿn dỿỽylh, ac ỿn gỿmỿlog; ỿ gau phordh amdeithiaỽc ỿn amrabhael: er hỿnny pnnn gapher hi, drỽy labhur anorphỽys, a gỽadalỽch hỿſtadl, hi a dhỽg gidac chi elỽmaỽr, a digribhỽch i‘r neb a bhedho arni.

div.head: Rhỿbydh.
div.p: Ỿ neb a arbhero'r dhulh honn, edryched ar bhod ỿ debhnydh ỿn dha: rhac idho ei bhỽrỽ ei hun alhan o bob rhadbherthỽch ỽrth gỿnnic gormod. Ỿn neſa gocheled roi gormod cennat; rhac bod tuedhbhryd, neu anỽybỿdhiaeth ỿn ỿ beirneit: pei hỿnny, gỽanhae ebh ei arbhaeth, ỽrth roi cennat gorbelhic.

div.head: III.
div.p: Dulh ar alh ar gennatauad ỿ ſydh, pann bho‘r araithiỽr ỿn godhebh i'r caſdhyn ryỽ ỽeithred ỿn ỽatỽorus: ac ỽrth hỿnny ỿn goludhio‘r peth; cyd bei‘r geiriau ỿn arỽydl ocauamgenach.

div.head: Eghraph o‘r ſcruthur lan bhal hynn.
div.p: Ỿmlaỽenha ỽr ibhaghc ỿn dỿ ibheghtit; ac ỿmdhigribhet dỿ gallon ỿn nỿdhiau dỿ ibheghtit; cerdha ar phyrdh dỿ bhedhỽl; a golỿgiaethau dỿ lỿgaid. Eccl. 11. 9. 10. Gỽelỽch ỿma bhod Selebh megys ỿn godhebh iỽ yr iebhaghc gāphordhi ỿn ol ei ỽỿlhys ei hun: Onid nid yỽ hynn o araith ond godhebhiad gỽatỽorus, ỿsbrỿdaỽl, ỿn lhudhio'r cỿbhr yỽ groeſſanaeth, mal ỿ gelhir gỽeled ỿn ỿr vn rhyỽ ỽers, ỿn ỿ geiriau hyn. Ond gỽybydh ỿ bydh ỿn ol hynn i‘r arglỽydh dỿ dhỽyn di i bharn am hynn olh.

div.head: Eghraph myỽn Prỿdỿdhiaeth bhal hynn.
div.l: ‘R ỽybh ỿn phol bhynd i‘th holi:
Ac anoeth ỽybh ganu a thi.
Ond ỽy‘n gỽybod bhod a bhu,
div.p: Ed. Pr.

Rhaid i‘r hyodl araithiỽr ochel, rhag arbher ỿ dhulh honn ỿm mhlith rhei anỽybodaỽl: rhac tỿbied o honynt, roi cennad idhynt, i ỽneuthyd ỿ peth a ỽaherdhir idhynt, ỿn hỿrith, ac ỿn hỿgudh, ar ỿmadrodh godhebhedig.

div.head: XLI. PENNOD.
Am Gỿtteuluad.
div.p: CỾtteuluad yỽ phygr, pan bho‘r araithiỽr ỿn cỿbhanſodhi pethau amrabhaelus, a gỽrthỽynebus: er mỽyn gỽrthladh medhỽl cỿphredin ỿ rhann bhỽyabh, neu ‘n hỿtrach ỿ cỽbl.

div.head: Eghraph bhal hynn.
div.p: Ỿ cỿbydh, a‘r hael bỿrlhaỽioc, pob vn o honynt ſydh ar bhei gan nad yỽ ‘r vn o honynt ỿn arbher ei golud modh ỿ dỿleynt am ei bod ỿn ei gam arbher, ac ỿn ennilh cỽilidh o dhiỽrtho.

div.head: XLII. PENNOD.
Am Labharedigaeth.
div.p: HYd ỿn hynn bu traethaỽd am Adhurneg, ỿ rhan gỿntabh o Phrae thineb: ỿnaỽr mae ‘n callyn ſonnio ‘chỿdig am Labharedigaeth, ſ. ỿ rhann aralh.

Lhabharedigaeth yỽ lhabharu pob rhyỽ araith ac ỿmadrodh, ỿn eglur, ỿn drebhnus, ỿn hỿſain, ỿn
ỽedhus, ac ỿn ganmoladỽy.
Dau beth ſydh i chỽi iỽ ỿſtỿrrio o rann lhabharedigaeth: Ỿn gỿntabh lhais; Ỿn ail ỿmdhỿgiad ỿr holh gorph.

div.head: I.
div.p: O rann ỿ lhais. Ỿn gỿntabh, rhaid yỽ i‘r araithiỽr gadỽ cỿmedrolder; ſebh na bo hi, na rhy dhobhn, na rhy bhain: ac na bo hi vnſain. Ỿn neſabh, lhabhared bob gair ỿn ol cỿbhadhaſdeb ỿ bhraỽdhaeg; a‘i harỽedhocad; mal ỿ bo amryỽder, ac aghhỿphelỿbrỽydh ỿ nỽydau ỿn gobhyn, ac ỿn godhe. Ỿn drỿdỿdh, lhabhared bob braỽdheg ỿn ol rhyỽian ‘r nỽydau, a‘r achoſsion debhnỿdhiaỽl, a bhonr amgỿphredic ỿn ỿr araith

Ỿn dhiau vn o‘r priodoliaethau pennabh, a‘r ſydh ỿn perthyn i araithiỽr phraethlon a pharabldhoeth, yỽ bod o‘i dabhaỽd ỿn ỽiſci, ỿn gỿbhlỿmaie, ỿn drobelydr, ac ỿn arbheraỽl o draethu, a honni pethaui gỿnỿdlra araithỽriaeth, a phraethineb.

div.head: II.
div.p: O RANN ỿmdh ỿgiad ỿ corph; Rhaid i‘r araithiỽr gỿmryd gobhal, ar idho bhod ỿn ‘ỽrỽedh, ac nid ỿn amneidlyt.

Ỿ mae‘r ỿmdhỿgiad ỿn rhoi enaid ỿn ỿ pethau a adrodhir; ỿn cỿnnỿrbhu ‘r gỽrandaỽyr; ỿn ei tỿneru hỽynt; gan lareidhio, a medhalu ei coeliedigaethau gỽrthneſsic; gann beri idhynt goelio, mae gỽir yỽ‘r peth, ỿn ỿr hỽnn ỿ mỿnnent ei ſebhỿdlu.

Ac ỿmma mae vn peth hỿnod o rann ỿr ỿmdhỿgiad iỽ ỿſtỿrrio: nid amgcn; nad yỽ‘r araith, a ſcribhennir myỽn pabỽyr, ac bhelhy a dharlhennir, ỿn gỽeithredu hanner cỿmeint ỿgh ghhallonnau‘r gỽrandaỽyr o ỿmmodbhryd; a phann draethir
ar dabhod labherydh, ỿn ỽiỽrỽydh, ỿn ſoniarus, ac o dhỿbhnder callon. Ỿr ac hos paham, yỽ; am nas galh gỽr a‘i ‘raphol, neu bin ſcribhennu, neu dhelỽedhu ỿ mỿnudiau ỿmodaỽl, a‘r ỿmdhỿgiad, ſydh raid i r araithiỽr (ỽrth ỿmadrodh) ei dangos, ỿn ol dirdab ỿ nỽydau, ac arỽydhocad ỿ braỽdhegan. Ac herỽydh hỿnny ỿ dỿỽaid Plato, bhod rhagoriaeth maỽr rhỽgh phyrbh ỿmdhidhan ỿn hỿphraeth, ac ſcribhennu ‘n hỿdhoeth: o blegyd n, ni a ‘ỽelỽnn Laỽeroedh, a ‘madrodhant ỿn barablaidh iaỽn, heb bhedryd rhoi ei medhỽl myỽn ſcribhen hanner da: ac erailh ỿghỽrthỽyneb, ỿn ſcribhennu ei medhỽl ỿn odidaỽg: ac ỿn parablu ỿn aghhỿmmen.

Nid a bhi i roi ar laỽr ỿma paỽedh ỿ mae i‘r araithiỽr ỿn bendant, ỿmdhỽyn, o rann ỿ penn, ỿ lhỿgaid, ỿ dhỽybhron, ỿ traet, ỿ dỽylo, O blegyd mae‘n haỽſſach dỿſcu hỿnny, ỽrth edrych a dal ſelỽ, ar ỽyr doeth, dyſcedig, pỽy vn ai pregethỽyr duỽiol, ai cỿbhreithỽyr parablbur, ỿn ỿmdhỽyn ei hunain ar air, ac ỿmdhỿgiad, pob rharno i cỿrph, pann bhỿdhant nailh ar‘n pregethu gair Duỽ ỿn dhirbhrỿdus; ỿntau ỿn lhys ỿ teyrn, ỿn araithio ỿm mhlaid cỿbhiaỽnder rhỽgh plaid, a phlaid, rhỽgh gỽan a chadarn; i gael o baỽb a dhỿleu, er meithrin braỽdỽriaeth, mammaethu cỿttundeb, a chỿnnal taghnedhybh. Ỿr honn Duỽ a‘i danbhono, gida chỿnnydh a lhỽydhiant gỽir grebhydh Griſt, i aros ỿn ein plith, i barhau‘n lỽydhiannus: er maỽl i‘r tragỽdhol Dhuỽ, ac er clod ei drugaredh arnom ỿn oes oeſſoedh. Amen.

div.head: LHECH. O HENỼAV Ỿ TROBHEGAV A‘R Dulhỽedhau ỿmadrodh, a egluryd ỿn ỿ lhybhr hỽnn, ar ol goſodiad lhỿthrennau‘r ‘ỽydhor.

Lhech o henỽau ỿ prỿdỿdhon (nid ỿ dynt ỿn eglur ag ỿn hỿ lythur ỽedi ei delỽedhu ỿn ỿmbelh bhannoedh ỿn ỿ lhỿbhran hỽn) er mỽyn chỽaneg ỽybodaeth. Eithur am Aỽduron ỿ Scruthur lan nid ỿghanabh ỿma, blỿgid ỿr ỽy ỿn tỿbied ei bod ỿn hỿ nod ag ỿn ỿsbys dhigon gann baỽb.

div.head: At ỿr hỿgar Dharlhennydh.
div.p:
LHỾMA o‘r dyỽedh (i Dhuỽ ỿ bo ‘r diolch) dhyỽedh ar hynn o lỿbhran. Eithur ei dhaed (cyd ỿ bỽybh o eſtrongenedl, ag (ſy ỽa eth) heb dhealh dim o‘r iaith, ni bhedra bharnu, Duỽ a‘igỽyr. Diau
yỽ hynn na bhu nag arnabhi, nag ar ỿ golỿgỽr dhim gỽalh; ar ỿ nailh o ran tegỽch print, ar ỿ ihalh o ran cỿ ỽaincyd ỿ cereudhe hhỿ ghalhu bhi, nag ỿ cỿ ddhỿge ei hambdhen ỿntau ỿm mhlith gobhalon erailh. Erỽa mỿnych ỿ dygỽydh, na lỽydha etibhedh o‘i bheithrin gidag eſtroniaid cỿſtal, a chida ei rieni eihun: le rhaid i‘m gỿ bhadhe, naſ galh bhod o‘r vn cỿbhlỽr a godidogrỽydh, ag a bhaſe, pỿ gỽ elſe Duỽ ỿn dha, bod ỿr Aỽ dur ỿn gỿ drỿ chiolỽrth ei brintio. Y dalbhỿrru, o dỿgỽydhodh bai myỽn vn bhan, adhaỽa ar bhỿ ghoneſtrỽydh (drỽy gael gỽybod beth bhỿtho) ỽrth ei ail brintio, ei drebhny a‘i gỽeirio ỽrth ỿch bodh. Ỿn ỿ cỿbhamſer ỿſtỿrriỽch eirie S. Paỽl Delicta tegit Charitas; a chỿmerỽch hynn, tra bhoch ỿn aros gỽelh. 1595.
